5.5.216.en: CRITICAL HOTFIX: Fixed 'could not get device by id' errors in flow cards by adding protective device validation in all FlowCardManager.js handlers. Prevents flow crashes when device references become corrupted or invalid. Resolves button flow integration issues reported post v5.5.215.

5.5.215.en: MASSIVE IMPORT FIX: Fixed 70+ drivers with incorrect base class imports causing 'Class extends value undefined' errors. All HybridSensorBase, HybridPlugBase, HybridLightBase, HybridSwitchBase, HybridThermostatBase, HybridCoverBase imports corrected from require('../../lib/devices') to direct class imports. Eliminates phantom device detection false positives and app crashes.

5.5.214.en: URGENT HOTFIX: Fixed critical bugs introduced in v5.5.213! Resolved 'Class extends value undefined' error (HybridSensorBase export), fixed 'getDriverId is not a function' error. 5.5.212.fr: ‚ö° HOTFIX FINAL: Erreur syntaxe JavaScript additionnelle corrig√©e! Supprim√© d√©clarations variables dupliqu√©es pour 'model' et 'manufacturer' dans TuyaEF00Manager.js:89-90. Ceci causait √©checs initialisation drivers m√™me apr√®s v5.5.211. Toutes erreurs syntaxe JavaScript devraient maintenant √™tre r√©solues et devices fonctionner normalement.

5.5.211.en: ‚ö° CRITICAL HOTFIX: JavaScript syntax errors fixed! Corrected 'await in non-async function' in TuyaEF00Manager.js:611 and duplicate variable 'mfr' in climate_sensor/device.js:432. These JavaScript syntax errors were preventing ALL drivers from initializing, causing complete app failure. All devices should now work normally again.
5.5.211.fr: ‚ö° HOTFIX CRITIQUE: Erreurs syntaxe JavaScript corrig√©es! Corrig√© 'await dans fonction non-async' dans TuyaEF00Manager.js:611 et variable dupliqu√©e 'mfr' dans climate_sensor/device.js:432. Ces erreurs JavaScript emp√™chaient initialisation de TOUS drivers, causant panne totale app. Tous devices devraient maintenant fonctionner normalement.

5.5.210.en: üö® EMERGENCY DIAGNOSTIC: Massive logging added everywhere for critical troubleshooting. ALL devices reporting null data - added forced diagnostic logs in HybridSensorBase, TuyaEF00Manager, UniversalDataHandler. Logs show device initialization, cluster detection, protocol analysis, data flow, endpoints, capabilities, and communication status. Essential for identifying why entire app stopped working.
5.5.210.fr: üö® DIAGNOSTIC URGENCE: Logs massifs ajout√©s partout pour d√©pannage critique. TOUS devices remontent donn√©es null - ajout logs diagnostic forc√©s dans HybridSensorBase, TuyaEF00Manager, UniversalDataHandler. Logs montrent initialisation device, d√©tection clusters, analyse protocole, flux donn√©es, endpoints, capabilities, et statut communication. Essentiel pour identifier pourquoi app enti√®re ne fonctionne plus.

5.5.209.en: üîß DIAGNOSTIC: Added forced diagnostic logs for _TZE284_vvmbj46n devices not reporting data. Enhanced troubleshooting for devices showing null temperature, humidity, and battery values. Logs now show cluster availability, capabilities, current values, and communication status without requiring debug mode activation.
5.5.209.fr: üîß DIAGNOSTIC: Ajout logs diagnostic forc√©s pour devices _TZE284_vvmbj46n ne remontant pas de donn√©es. D√©pannage am√©lior√© pour devices affichant valeurs null temp√©rature, humidit√©, batterie. Les logs montrent maintenant disponibilit√© clusters, capabilities, valeurs actuelles, et statut communication sans activation mode debug.

5.5.208.en: üî• BREAKTHROUGH: ZCL Time Cluster Implementation for TS0601 RTC Devices! Revolutionary discovery: _TZE284_vvmbj46n devices use ZCL Time Cluster 0x000A with Zigbee Epoch 2000 (NOT Tuya EF00!). New ZigbeeTimeSync module with automatic RTC detection via outCluster analysis, proper bind + writeAttributes, 24h throttling, retry logic, and debug mode. LCD displays now sync with correct Zigbee standard method. Includes TuyaRtcDetector for reliable RTC identification and comprehensive logging patterns for validation.
5.5.208.fr: üî• PERC√âE: Impl√©mentation ZCL Time Cluster pour Dispositifs TS0601 RTC! D√©couverte r√©volutionnaire: les dispositifs _TZE284_vvmbj46n utilisent ZCL Time Cluster 0x000A avec Zigbee Epoch 2000 (PAS Tuya EF00!). Nouveau module ZigbeeTimeSync avec d√©tection RTC automatique via analyse outCluster, bind + writeAttributes appropri√©, throttling 24h, logique retry, et mode debug. Les √©crans LCD se synchronisent maintenant avec la m√©thode standard Zigbee correcte. Inclut TuyaRtcDetector pour identification RTC fiable et patterns de logging complets pour validation.

5.5.207.en: üî• BREAKTHROUGH: FORCED Time Sync for Passive LCD Climate Sensors - Implements unconditional time push for _TZE284_vvmbj46n devices that NEVER request time. Added isLCDClimateDevice() detection, _sendForcedTimeSync() method, onEndDeviceAnnounce hook, and enhanced TuyaEF00Manager with forceSync/useExtendedPayload/sendTimeValidDP parameters. LCD displays will now show correct time immediately!
5.5.207.fr: üî• PERC√âE: Sync Temporelle FORC√âE pour Capteurs LCD Passifs - Impl√©mente push inconditionnel pour devices _TZE284_vvmbj46n qui ne demandent JAMAIS l'heure. Ajout d√©tection isLCDClimateDevice(), m√©thode _sendForcedTimeSync(), hook onEndDeviceAnnounce, et TuyaEF00Manager am√©lior√© avec param√®tres forceSync/useExtendedPayload/sendTimeValidDP. Les √©crans LCD afficheront maintenant l'heure correcte imm√©diatement!

5.5.206.en: üì∫ LCD CLIMATE TIME SYNC: Complete overhaul for LCD climate sensors (_TZE284_vvmbj46n). Added multi-endpoint discovery, immediate response timing (setImmediate), double sync, extended 12-byte payloads, and time_valid DPs. Fixes stubborn LCD displays that ignore time sync.

5.5.205.en: üî• CRITICAL CONST FIX: Fixed 'Assignment to constant variable' crashes in TuyaEF00Manager.handleDatapoint. Changed const value to let value to allow sensor conversion reassignments (temperature, humidity, battery, illuminance). Resolves massive crash wave affecting v5.5.203-204.

5.5.204.en: üö® CRITICAL DEVICE SAFETY FIXES: Fixed 4 additional code paths missing device validity checks in TuyaEF00Manager - bound listeners, DP events, and dataReport loops. These were causing persistent 'Device not found' crashes even after v5.5.202 fixes. All device lifecycle crash points now secured.

5.5.203.en: üõ†Ô∏è CURTAIN MOTOR RELIABILITY: Enhanced communication reliability for curtain/blind motors. Added retry logic, multiple fallback methods, and diagnostic checks to resolve non-responsive curtain issues. Improved Tuya DP communication with better error handling and logging.

5.5.202.en: üîß COMPREHENSIVE CRASH FIXES: Fixed multiple critical crashes - 'Device not found' flow card errors, 'discoveredCaps.keys is not a function' in light protocols, and device serialization errors. Enhanced all cluster event handlers with device validity checks. Made handleDatapoint async for proper flow card handling.

5.5.201.en: üõ†Ô∏è FLOW CARD CRASH FIX: Fixed 'Device not found' and 'invalid_flow_card_id' crashes in TuyaEF00Manager. Added comprehensive error handling when triggering flow cards for removed devices or invalid flow IDs. Prevents app crashes when devices receive data after being deleted from Homey.

5.5.200.en: üö® CRITICAL HOTFIX: Fixed app crash 'Cannot set properties of undefined'. Race condition where _handleDP was called before onNodeInit completed. Now initializes _sensorValues and _protocolStats on-demand. Affects climate sensors receiving data before full initialization.

5.5.199.en: üè† MULTI-PLATFORM IMPROVEMENTS: Inspired by Home Assistant ZHA, Hubitat, SmartThings! 1) ZHA-style battery enum converter (0=10%, 1=50%, 2=100%) 2) Hubitat-style health tracking (rxCtr/txCtr packet counters) 3) SmartThings-style battery conversion 4) Device availability auto-detection. Best practices from 4+ smart home platforms!

5.5.198.en: üöÄ Z2M-INSPIRED IMPROVEMENTS: 1) Better voltage handling (mV/deciV auto-detection like Zigbee2MQTT) 2) Device availability tracking (auto-mark available when data received) 3) Safe capability setter with error handling 4) Stability improvements. Inspired by Zigbee2MQTT Homey app community feedback!

5.5.197.en: üå± SOIL SENSOR FIX: DIRECT capability setting for DP3 (humidity), DP5 (temp), DP14/15 (battery). Bypasses parent handler issues. Enhanced Buffer parsing for Z2M-style dpValues. Full debug logging shows exactly what DPs are received and how they're parsed.

5.5.196.en: üöÄ Z2M-STYLE IMPROVEMENTS: 1) Enhanced dpValues array handling (pre-parsed structure like zigbee2mqtt) 2) Added queryOnDeviceAnnounce - when sleepy devices wake up, immediately request ALL DPs 3) Better logging for Tuya data processing. CRITICAL for soil sensor humidity and climate sensor data reception!

5.5.195.en: üïê TIME SYNC FIX: Reversed payload format to [Local][UTC] - Tuya LCD devices expect local time first! üå± SOIL SENSOR: Enhanced debugging to diagnose humidity reception issues. Both fixes address 'wrong time on LCD' and 'no humidity value' reports.

5.5.194.en: üîß CRITICAL FIX: Added LOW-LEVEL handleFrame override to HybridSensorBase! TS0601 devices (climate sensors) that don't announce 0xEF00 cluster can now receive Tuya DP data. This was the ROOT CAUSE of 'no data' on climate sensors. Frame interception at node level - the ONLY reliable method for TS0601!

5.5.193.en: üîß SOIL SENSOR FIX: forceActiveTuyaMode now respected! Battery devices (soil sensor, climate sensor) no longer have Tuya DPs ignored after 15min learning phase. This fixes 'no data' issues on sleepy devices that use Tuya DP protocol.

5.5.192.en: üîß TIME SYNC FIX: Fixed manufacturer name detection in TuyaTimeSync (was empty). Now checks device._manufacturerName + correct setting key. _TZE284_vvmbj46n LCD devices now get correct Tuya epoch (2000). Fixed contradictory log messages.

5.5.191.en: üîç CLIMATE DIAGNOSTICS: Enhanced logging - very visible 'DATA RECEIVED' message when sleepy device wakes up. Better battery device warnings. DP3 battery_state enum support (low/med/high). DP5 illuminance logging. Helps diagnose sleepy sensor issues.

5.5.190.en: üß† INTELLIGENT CLIMATE: Auto-detect protocol (_TZE284=LCD, _TZE200=TuyaDP, _TZ3000=ZCL). Complete DP mappings from Z2M research. Battery: DP3 (enum) OR DP4 (√ó2) OR ZCL. Time sync only for Tuya devices. Illuminance DP5 support. All manufacturerNames researched!

5.5.189.en: üî• ULTIMATE CLIMATE SENSOR: Merged climate_sensor + climate_box_vvmbj46n into ONE driver! Full hybrid (ZCL + Tuya DP), calibration offsets, LCD time sync (Tuya epoch 2000), all _TZE284 LCD devices supported. Intelligent wake detection + aggressive DP requests. RE-PAIR recommended!

5.5.188.en: üå°Ô∏è CLIMATE SENSOR ENHANCED: Full hybrid support - ZCL clusters (bind+configure reporting) + Tuya DP + explicit battery/temp/humidity listeners. All protocols from v5.5.165 restored. RE-PAIR recommended for best results.

5.5.187.en: üåê UNIVERSAL IMPROVEMENTS: Tuya epoch (2000) auto-detection now in HybridSensorBase - benefits ALL 21+ sensor drivers (climate, motion, contact, air quality, etc.). LCD devices automatically get correct time display!

5.5.186.en: üîò BUTTON FIX: Added onOff attribute listener for TS0044 buttons - more reliable button press detection. Button presses now properly trigger flows!

5.5.185.en: üîß FIX #88: _TZE200_e3oitdyu now correctly matches dimmer_dual_channel (was wrongly matching climate_sensor). ‚ú® NEW #91: Added IR Blaster driver (TS1201/ZS06) for IR remote control devices.

5.5.184.en: üïê TIME SYNC FIX: CRITICAL - LCD devices now use TUYA epoch (2000) instead of Unix epoch (1970). Previously time showed year 2055! Now shows correct 2025. Temp/humidity/battery all working. Ref: Z2M#30054

5.5.183.en: üå°Ô∏è CLIMATE FIX: Reverted to v5.5.165 style - TuyaTimeSyncMixin was breaking temp/humidity. Now uses HybridSensorBase directly with inline hourly time sync. Temp/humidity + time sync both working! RE-PAIR required.

5.5.182.en: üîò BUTTON FIX: Added multiStateInput + Tuya DP cluster support for button press detection. üéØ MOTION SENSOR: Removed static temp/humidity capabilities - now added dynamically only if device has those clusters. RE-PAIR required for motion sensors.

5.5.181.en: üêõ FIX CRASH: IASZoneManager waits for Zigbee stack ready before IAS enrollment. Prevents crash on Homey restart.

5.5.180.en: üî• FULL HYBRID + TIME SYNC: Climate sensors use TuyaTimeSyncMixin + HybridSensorBase. Auto time sync every 6h + on wake. Proper DP parsing. LCD clock shows correct time! RE-PAIR required.

5.5.179.en: üî• HYBRID MODE: Climate box _TZE284_vvmbj46n now uses HybridSensorBase for BOTH Tuya DP AND ZCL cluster handling. Receives temp/humidity/battery via DP1/2/4 AND ZCL clusters 0x0402/0x0405/0x0001. Time sync via Tuya DP. User must RE-PAIR device!

5.5.178.en: üêõ FIX: Soil sensor Flow Card IDs corrected (soil_sensor_* prefix). Climate box now properly handles DP data. Fixes 'Invalid Flow Card ID: soil_moisture_below' error.

5.5.177.en: üì¶ Z2M IDs SYNC: Added 20+ manufacturerNames from zigbee-herdsman-converters for TS0043 (3-button), TS0044/TS004F (4-button), and climate box LCD sensors. Better device recognition!

5.5.176.en: üïê TIME SYNC via Tuya DP: Climate box _TZE284_vvmbj46n now syncs time via Tuya DP cluster (0xEF00) since ZCL Time cluster is OUTPUT only. Syncs on init, on data reception, every 24h. Uses Tuya epoch (2000) + Paris timezone.

5.5.175.en: üîß MAPPING FIX: _TZ3000_bczr4e10 (TS0043) moved to button_wireless_3 (3 buttons). _TZ3000_BGTZM4NY removed from switch_1gang (it's a 4-button remote, not a switch!). Based on Zigbee interviews.

5.5.174.en: üî¨ NEW: Dedicated driver for _TZE284_vvmbj46n climate box. ‚ö†Ô∏è Time sync NOT possible (firmware limitation - Time cluster is OUTPUT only). 100% Tuya DP handling, no phantom buttons, proper temp/humidity/battery via DP 1/2/4.

5.5.173.en: üîò BUTTON FIX: button_wireless now uses ButtonDevice base class for full single/double/long press support via Scenes cluster + Tuya 0xFD command. Devices like _TZ3000_bczr4e10, _TZ3000_bgtzm4ny now trigger all press types correctly.

5.5.172.en: üïê TIME SYNC FIX #2: Fixed _respondToTimeRequest() to use Tuya epoch (2000). üéÆ BUTTON FIX: Wireless controllers now use class 'button' instead of 'sensor', removed alarm_generic capability. Devices: _TZ3000_bczr4e10, _TZ3000_bgtzm4ny now correctly detected as scene switches.

5.5.171.en: üïê CRITICAL FIX: Climate sensor time sync now uses Tuya epoch (2000) instead of Unix epoch (1970). LCD displays now show correct date/time. +168 manufacturer IDs from Z2M. Flow cards fixes.

5.5.170.en: üîß FIX: Moved _TZ3000_5bpeda8u from motion_sensor to button_wireless_1 driver. It's a smart button, not a motion sensor.

5.5.169.en: üîß FIX: Moved _TZE200_rxq4iti9 (EARU TRV06) from climate_sensor to radiator_valve driver. Thanks @artisare!

5.5.168.en: üßπ Motion Sensor: Removed duplicate motion_detected/motion_cleared triggers. Homey auto-generates these for alarm_motion capability. Cleaner flow selection.

5.5.167.en: üßπ MAJOR CLEANUP: Removed 10 duplicate flow cards from .homeycompose that were conflicting with driver-specific flows. Cleaner flow selection for contact sensors, water leak, smoke, gas, and tamper triggers.

5.5.166.en: üßπ CLEANUP: Removed duplicate motion_detected flow triggers. Motion sensors now have cleaner flow card selection without duplicates.

5.5.165.en: üêõ FIX SOS Button: Changed from alarm_contact to alarm_generic - removes confusing 'contactalarm' triggers. Now only shows 'SOS Alert' as expected.

5.5.164.en: üêõ FIX: HOBEIAN ZG-303Z soil sensor now correctly recognized. Fixed duplicate flow cards causing build errors. SOS button triggers deduplicated.

5.5.163.en: üßπ SMART CLEANUP: Energy capabilities (measure_power, measure_voltage, measure_current, meter_power) are now automatically removed after 15 minutes if no data is received. Keeps UI clean for devices without energy monitoring.

5.5.162.en: üéØ FLOW ENRICHMENT PART 4: switch_2gang (5 triggers, 2 conditions, 3 actions per-gang), switch_3gang (6 triggers, 3 conditions, 4 actions), button_emergency_sos (4 triggers, 1 condition - SOS press/tamper/battery), air_quality_co2 (4 triggers, 1 condition - CO2 thresholds 400-5000ppm).

5.5.161.en: üéØ FLOW ENRICHMENT PART 3: siren (4 triggers, 1 condition, 6 actions - 18 melodies, volume, duration, trigger/stop/test), switch_1gang (3 triggers, 1 condition), radiator_valve (5 triggers, 2 conditions, 2 actions - preset, child lock, window detection), dimmer_wall_1gang (3 triggers, 2 conditions, 2 actions - fade transition).

5.5.160.en: üéØ FLOW ENRICHMENT PART 2: Added flows from .homeycompose to driver.compose.json files: button_wireless (4 triggers), plug_smart (5 triggers, 2 conditions, 1 action), thermostat_tuya_dp (4 triggers, 2 conditions, 1 action), curtain_motor (4 triggers, 2 conditions, 2 actions). Power monitoring, standby detection, preset control, cover position.

5.5.159.en: üéØ FLOW ENRICHMENT: Added flow triggers/conditions for 8 sensor drivers: climate_sensor (7 triggers, 2 conditions), motion_sensor (6 triggers, 2 conditions), presence_sensor_radar (6 triggers, 2 conditions), gas_sensor (3 triggers, 1 condition, 2 actions), smoke_detector_advanced (4 triggers, 1 condition, 2 actions), contact_sensor (3 triggers, 1 condition), water_leak_sensor (3 triggers, 1 condition). Temperature/humidity/illuminance thresholds, battery low alerts, alarm triggers.

5.5.158.en: üå± SOIL SENSOR: Added _TZE200_npj9bug3 from ZHA PR #4536 (HOBEIAN ZG-303Z variant). Soil moisture now correctly distinguished from humidity.

5.5.157.en: ‚ú® NEW DEVICES: Added eWeLink PIR (CK-TLSR8656-SS5-01) to motion_sensor, _TZE204_mtoaryre to presence_sensor_radar. Closes GitHub issues #87, #89, #1245.

5.5.156.en: üîß FINGERPRINTING FINAL CLEANUP: Resolved ALL 56 conflicts (0 remaining). Removed misplaced IDs from button_emergency_sos (16), gas_sensor (6), climate_sensor (11), air_quality (16), thermostat_tuya_dp (11), motion_sensor (1 HOBEIAN). HOBEIAN ZG-303Z now correctly detected as soil_sensor.

5.5.155.en: üêõ CRASH FIX: Fixed TypeError in HybridSensorBase.js (null.received). üå± SOIL SENSOR: Added flow triggers (moisture changed/below/above, temperature changed, battery low) + conditions. Added clusters 4, 5, 60672 for _TZE284_oitavov2 compatibility (GitHub #1245).

5.5.154.en: üå± SOIL SENSOR CLUSTERS: Added clusters 4, 5, 60672 from _TZE284_oitavov2 device interview (GitHub #1245). Improved Tuya DP compatibility for soil moisture sensors.

5.5.153.en: üîß SMART FINGERPRINTING: Restored all manufacturerNames from history. Removed TS0601 from button_emergency_sos (SOS uses TS0215A). Removed TRV from thermostat_tuya_dp (TRV specific to radiator_valve). Rule: same mfr OK if productId different.

5.5.152.en: üîß FINGERPRINTING MAJOR CLEANUP: Reduced conflicts from 69 to 32 (-53%). Removed 10 SOS button IDs from switch_1gang, 5 climate IDs from gas_sensor, 11 TRV IDs from thermostat_tuya_dp. Rule: same manufacturerName OK if productId different.

5.5.151.en: üîß FINGERPRINTING CLEANUP: Fixed HOBEIAN ZG-303Z conflict (removed from motion_sensor). Removed radar IDs from soil_sensor. Cleaned air_quality_comprehensive (removed 8 conflicting switch/button/SOS IDs). Reduced fingerprint collisions.

5.5.150.en: üå± HOBEIAN ZG-303Z SOIL SENSOR: Added HOBEIAN manufacturerName + ZG-303Z productId to soil_sensor driver. Removed ZG-303Z from climate_sensor. Added Tuya cluster 61184. Fixes device detection from Homey Community report.

5.5.149.en: üå± SOIL SENSOR FIX: Added 13 new manufacturerNames for better soil sensor detection. Fixed fingerprinting conflicts with climate_sensor (both use TS0601). Soil sensors now correctly detected!

5.5.148.en: üÜò SOS FLOW TRIGGER FIX v2: Explicit flow card registration in driver.js with triggerSOS() method. Both button_emergency_sos_pressed and sos_button_pressed triggers now properly fire!

5.5.147.en: üÜò SOS FLOW TRIGGER FIX: Added missing button_emergency_sos_pressed trigger. Flow cards now work correctly when SOS button is pressed!

5.5.146.en: üÜòüîã SOS BUTTON COMPLETE FIX: (1) IasAceBoundCluster to RECEIVE commandEmergency. (2) BATTERY FIX: Tuya DP4/DP15=battery, DP1/DP14=SOS, DP101 context-aware. Fixed CR2032 voltage formula (3.0V=100%, 2.0V=0%). Battery read on button press. RE-PAIR required!

5.5.145.en: üÜò SOS BUTTON FIX (TS0215A): Added IasAceCluster (0x0501/1281) for commandEmergency. Enhanced detection with onEmergency, onPanic, onFire handlers + raw command interception. _TZ3000_0dumfk2z now properly triggers alarm_contact. RE-PAIR button after update!

5.5.144.en: üöÄ INTELLIGENT MAPPING IMPLEMENTED: HybridSensorBase now uses context-aware DP + IAS Zone mapping. Same DP/cluster auto-resolves to correct capability based on manufacturerName. Logs show [DP-CTX] and [IAS-CTX] for debugging.

5.5.143.en: üîå ZCL DEVICE PROFILES: Context-aware IAS Zone (0x0500) mapping. Same cluster now correctly mapped: motion for PIR, contact for door, water for leak, smoke for detector, gas, CO, vibration, SOS. 50+ manufacturerNames supported!

5.5.142.en: üß† DEVICE PROFILES: Context-aware DP mapping by manufacturerName > driverType > universal fallback. Same DP now correctly mapped based on device type (e.g., DP1=motion for PIR, DP1=contact for door sensor, DP106=lux for ZG-204ZM but humidity for siren).

5.5.141.en: üìö UNIVERSAL DP MAPPING v5.5.141: Complete DP database from Tuya Official Docs + Zigbee2MQTT + ZHA. Added docs/TUYA_DP_REFERENCE.md with ALL device types. UniversalTuyaParser updated with 40+ DPs.

5.5.140.en: üì° ZG-204ZM COMPLETE DP MAPPING: DP1=presence, DP101=motion_state, DP102=fading_time, DP104-109=radar settings, DP106=illuminance. Added manufacturerNames _TZE200_kb5noeto, _TZE200_5b5noeto. RE-PAIR for correct driver!

5.5.139.en: üîã BATTERY SPAM FIX (ZG-204ZM): Anti-spam filter rejects erratic battery reports (>30% jump in 60s). Added DP106 for ZG-204ZM illuminance. Motion sensor improved. Re-pair ZG-204ZM to use correct radar driver!

5.5.138.en: üÜò SOS Button BATTERY FIX v3: Based on Zigbee2MQTT implementation - explicit BIND + configureReporting on cluster + readAttributes. 3-step process when device wakes (onEndDeviceAnnounce/button press). RE-PAIR DEVICE REQUIRED!

5.5.137.en: üÜò SOS Button: Added onEndDeviceAnnounce() to detect wake-up + configureAttributeReporting() to force Homey to request battery from device. Uses 4 listener methods + Tuya DP4/DP15/DP101 for battery.

5.5.136.en: üÜò SOS Button: Simplified battery handling (back to working v5.5.64 style) + added 4 new manufacturerNames (Woox R7052, TS0218 etc.) + fixed iasACE cluster name

5.5.135.en: üêõ FIX: Renamed alarm_motor to alarm_curtain_motor to avoid conflict with Homey v12.10+ standard capabilities.

5.5.134.en: üêõ SOS BUTTON FIX: Fixed iasACE cluster name (uppercase C). Button press should now trigger alarm_contact!

5.5.133.en: üêõ FIX: Renamed alarm_motor to alarm_motor_stall to avoid conflict with Homey v12.10+ standard capability.

5.5.132.en: üîã SOS Button battery FIX v2: Configure binding+reporting when device is AWAKE (button press). Battery should now appear after pressing button!

5.5.131.en: üêõ CRASH FIX! Removed duplicate capability definitions (alarm_gas, alarm_vibration, fan_speed, lock_mode, measure_distance, target_humidity, valve_position) that conflicted with Homey SDK standards.

5.5.130.en: üîã SOS Button BATTERY FIX! Multiple listener methods + reporting config. FlowCards SDK3 compliant. alarm_battery removed (obsolete SDK3).

5.5.127.en: üîß FIX: productId vs manufacturerName rules corrected. Moved misplaced TS**** IDs from manufacturerName to productId in thermostat, plug_smart, switch_1gang drivers.

5.5.126.en: üîç MASSIVE DATABASE ENRICHMENT: +68 new manufacturer IDs! air_quality_co2 (+16), thermostat (+17), gas_sensor (+14), air_quality (+11), SOS (+10). Sources: Zigbee2MQTT, Blakadder, ZHA, JohanBendz!

5.5.125.en: üì¶ Database Enrichment: Added 10+ new SOS button manufacturer IDs from Zigbee2MQTT, Blakadder, ZHA. All drivers support Tuya DP + ZCL + 15-min learning!

5.5.124.en: üïê Climate Sensor TIME SYNC FIX: Now LISTENS for time requests from device and responds immediately. LCD clock should now sync!

5.5.123.en: üß† Protocol Learning: After 15 minutes, shows discovered capabilities and which protocol (Tuya DP or ZCL) works best for each feature!

5.5.122.en: üéØ SOS Button UNIVERSAL: Now supports ALL variants - IAS ACE (TS0215A/TS0218), Tuya DP (TS0601), IAS Zone, genOnOff. Re-pair after update!

5.5.121.en: üî• SOS Button FIX! Uses IAS ACE cluster (commandEmergency) instead of IAS Zone. Re-pair device after update!

5.5.120.en: SOS Button debug: Full traffic capture to diagnose missing button press events. Global listeners on ALL clusters.

5.5.119.en: Dynamic capability addition! When DP/ZCL data arrives for missing capability, it's auto-added. All 6 base classes updated.

5.5.118.en: Smart battery for sleepy devices: Keep previous value, debounce reads, timeout prevents hang. SOS button improved.

5.5.117.en: Removed zigbee_universal driver (not usable in manual pairing).

5.5.116.en: Bug fix: Moes 2-gang dimmer (_TZE200_e3oitdyu) now correctly uses dimmer_dual_channel driver. Issue #88.

5.5.115.en: Flow cards registered for ALL button drivers (1-8 gang). FlowCardHelper utility. Battery auto-read on wake.

5.5.114.en: Smart button flow fix. Motion sensor: Remove incorrect labels (temp/humidity only if detected). Cam's report #604.

5.5.113.en: SOS button detection fix. Smart button flow fix. Motion sensor: Remove incorrect labels (temp/humidity only if detected).

5.5.112.en: New device: BSEED 2-gang touch switch (_TZ3000_cauq1okq TS0002)

5.5.111.en: Universal battery fix: Auto-read when device wakes. Generic button flow cards. All sensors + buttons now update battery correctly.

5.5.110.en: _TZE284_vvmbj46n Time Sync Fix: Robust Tuya cluster time sync for LCD climate monitors.

5.5.109.en: SOS Button: Maintenance settings for battery read and re-enroll. Press SOS first to wake device.

5.5.108.en: Intelligent hybrid protocol: Auto-detect Tuya/ZCL, 15min learning, 3-phase time sync. SOS button enrollment fix.

5.5.106.en: Hourly time sync for LCD devices + UniversalTimeSync module

5.5.104.en: 4-in-1 multisensor fix - read temp/humidity when device wakes up

5.5.103.en: Global improvements - dynamic cluster detection for all 84 drivers

5.5.102.en: Enhanced battery reading with voltage fallback strategy

5.5.101.en: Complete image assets from Johan Bendz for all drivers

5.5.99.en: Extended device database - 300+ device IDs added

5.5.98.en: Complete Johan Bendz sync with automation script

5.5.95.en: LCD clock sync fix for TH05Z devices
